nodes.text: The RCLU was an organization chaired by Dotswa Ween in 22 BBY. Representing the RCLU as its chairbeing, Ween appeared on a talk show called In the Political Pit that was broadcast on the eleventh day of the fourth month in that year at 1935.

The RCLU was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 51, that was published in-universe. The section that referenced the group, titled "What to Scan," was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
